page.title: 13Thorpe in Balne's Herbs
page.content: The herb garden at the{Robin Craft {Centre}is a delightful place to visit. Here are some names of the herbs that we saw:{Ladies Mantle,Caraway,Hyssop, {Sage,Rosemary,Mint,Strawberry,Chives {Tansey,St.Johns Wort,Marjoram,Hoar {Hound,}and{Spearmint.}Some of the herbs are used for different things.{Caraway}has white flowers on the top and the stem is green. It is used in cakes.{Feverfew}is supposed to make headaches go away.{Chives}can be used in soups, salads, eggs or cream cheese. There are lots of trees near the herb garden.The herbs have different smells.{Marjoram}is green. It has purple flowers and looks very pretty in the herb garden.{Hissop}is green and has long blue flowers. Herbs have been used for thousands of years.
